result.eng: By the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.

result.ponchtml: Faoi ḋeireaḋ an 17ú haois ḃí deireaḋ le húinéireaċt scláḃaiṫe san EoraipBy the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.
